name: One-way
description:
Pro tip : press any key to play, one at a time. Two keys or more at the same time may crash  your browser.

Playing this game, you may :

  • Keep moving forward.
  • Go at different paces.
  • Encounter obstacles.
  • Fail and try again.
Version 0.5
  • generative level design
  • opponents
  • obstacles
  • dashing system
  • generative sound design
  • progressive and infinite difficulty
  • items to loot (in-progress)
Coming soon
  • Website, devlog and downloable
  • story-telling ?
  • bosses
  • shooting system (alternative to dash)
  • extra items (turn per turn activation, invincibility, time control, explosions…)
  • player characteristics system
  • greater variety of content (enemies, obstacles, melodies…)
  • animated, interwoven levels
  • any suggestions?
